content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that this code segment prints the string "EFCDAB"?

choices.label: for (int j = str.length() - 1; j >= 0; j -= 1) { result += str.substring(j, j + 1); }
for (int j = str.length() - 1; j >= 0; j -= 2) { result += str.substring(j, j + 2); }
for (int j = str.length() - 2; j >= 0; j -= 1) { result += str.substring(j, j + 2); }
for (int j = str.length() - 2; j >= 0; j -= 2) { result += str.substring(j, j + 2); }

content.answer: for (int j = str.length() - 2; j >= 0; j -= 2) { result += str.substring(j, j + 2); }

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
